at.qe.timeguess.gamelogic

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.qe.timeguess.gamelogic.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    Class that represents am open game. Contains all the game logic.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • joinGame

        public void joinGame(User player)
              throws Game.GameAlreadyRunningException
        Method to assign a new user to the game.
        Parameters:
        player - user that wants to join the game.
        Throws:
        Game.GameAlreadyRunningException - thrown when the game is already running

      • joinTeam

        public void joinTeam(Team team,
                     User player)
              throws Game.HostAlreadyReadyException
        Method to assign a player to a team. If the player is in the unassignedUsers list or in another team, it gets removed from there.
        Parameters:
        team - Team to move the user to
        player - User to move
        Throws:
        Game.HostAlreadyReadyException - thrown when the host is already ready.

      • leaveGame

        public void leaveGame(User player)
        Method to make a player leave a game if he is not assigned to a team or set him into 'offline state' if he is assigned to a team.
        Parameters:
        player - player to leave

      • updateReadyStatus

        public void updateReadyStatus(User user,
                              Boolean isReady)
        Method to update the ready status of a user. Also sends messages to frontend via websocket.
        Parameters:
        user - user to update the ready status of.
        isReady - new ready status.

      • startGame

        protected void startGame()
        Method that starts the active game phase and initializes all parameters.

      • diceUpdate

        public void diceUpdate(int facet)
        Method that is called whenever a dice gets updated and a game is mapped. Only accepts updates in appropriate situations, otherwise does nothing.

      • confirmExpression

        public void confirmExpression(String decision)
        Method that handles when a team confirms whether the current team guessed correct, wrong or invalid. only changes game flow in appropriate situations - in other situations it does nothing.
        Parameters:
        decision - can either be CORRECT, INVALID or WRONG

      • forceClose

        public void forceClose()
        Can get called by an admin to force close the game.

      • persistFinishedGame

        protected void persistFinishedGame()
        Method to persist a finished game

      • updateDiceBattery

        public void updateDiceBattery(int batteryStatus)
        Method that updates the dices battery status

      • updateDiceConnection

        public void updateDiceConnection(boolean isConnected)
        Method that updates the dices connection status. Blocks active game flow if dice is disconnected and starts a fresh round with a fresh expression upon reconnection.

      • allTeamsEnoughPlayersWithDevice

        protected boolean allTeamsEnoughPlayersWithDevice()
        Method that checks whether all teams have enough devices in their team.
        Returns:
        true if all teams have enough devices.

      • isInGame

        public boolean isInGame(User user)
        Method that checks whether a user is in the game.
        Parameters:
        user - user to check for
        Returns:
        true if the user is in the game, else false

      • isUserInCurrentTeam

        public boolean isUserInCurrentTeam(User user)
        Method that checks whether a user is in the currently guessing team.
        Parameters:
        user - user to check for
        Returns:
        true if user is in the currently guessing team, else false.

      • getCurrentPlayer

        protected User getCurrentPlayer()
        Method that returns the player that is currently guessing.
        Returns:
        the player that is currently guessing

      • getTeamByIndex

        public Team getTeamByIndex(Integer index)
                    throws Game.TeamIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Method that returns a team by its index.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the team
        Returns:
        team at index
        Throws:
        Game.TeamIndexOutOfBoundsException - when index is bigger then number of teams

      • checkGameStartable

        protected boolean checkGameStartable()
        Method that checks whether the game is startable
        Returns:
        True if the game is startable, false if not
